ygData.subject: Re: Intensify Death
ygData.msgSnippet: Poison Shock and research or buy (Grobb SK guild) pet spell only real useful ones.  Charm does not exist as L24 spell, but you can buy Screaming terror.  Buy
ygData.messageBody:
Poison Shock and research or buy (Grobb SK guild) pet spell only real
useful ones. Charm does not exist as L24 spell, but you can buy Screaming
terror. Buy the shield spells, Greater Shielding and Leatherskinn. The
latter ads 200 hp protection until used but cost a bloodstone per use (like
6gold ea). rest are useless.

At 01:42 PM 9/10/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Fitzroy <fitzroy69@...>
>
>Damn I am about to be 23rd and I am really looking forward to 24th, what do
>you folks reccomend
>for spells at that level, Also I don't really know what equipment i should
>be using. I am the only
>necromancer I know.
>
>
>Belsarius
>Tarew Marr
>
>--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Intensify Death is currently broken.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>>

>> >I was able to make the spell. But when using it I fail to see any real
>> >improvement in the max damage the pet does, nor unusual amounts of hitting
>> >for extra times per round, and also there seems to be no way to tell how
>> >long the spell works, or when it ends? The pet had no weapons just hands
>> >and feet. At the time I was L28, and the pet spell was L24, and the max
>> >damage the pet did, with or w/o the spell, was 22 a hit.
>> >
>> >Smakin DaBones
>> >L28 Necro - Povar
